source: The movie was great, lots of action and top notch movie stars. I'll be watching this one on repeat for months.

This is the 3rd sequel to the franchise and you can definitely tell. It's bascially the same story arc with slight changes to the characters. I could only watch about 10 minutes of it before I had to stop. It was turely terrible.
It was the best movie ever!
It was the worse movie ever!
